Lives Calculator

Want to see how your donations for the ELIMINATE Project are making a difference? Enter your donation amount below and see how many lives you are saving with that donation!

Thanks for helping us save mothers and children afflicted with MNT all over the world!

The conversion is calculated using the fact that $1.80 protects 1 woman and her future babies. For more facts and figures, check out this PDF!

$ = 1 life saved!
